name: Baldi's basic in education and learning V1.4.3
name_original: Baldi's basic in education and learning V1.4.3
description:
ah a simple game with adventures of learning and education, and much more

DO NOT DOWNLOAD THIS
it's not a simple learning game or anything

usable items:
safety scissors: allows you to cut the Playtime rope

BSoda: allows you to throw characters away from you

sweet: allows you to run without wasting energy

currency: you can get away from Bully or you can buy a BSoda

characters:
Playtime: it gets in the way of you making you jump rope

Bully: you need to give him an item to get out of your way

SWEEP: can push you anywhere (volume down recommended)

Director:
without running in the halls, without drinking in the halls, without entering the room just for college people
without buling in the corridors,
don't violate this in front of him

First prize: "I'm coming friend" "I see you" "why don't you love me?"

????: ????????????????

HOW TO PLAY:
look at a new school for you, and your chance to learn for real, make no mistake if your teacher will run after you. Get the 7 notebooks, and get out of school

Controls: (run: shift) (use item: right mouse button) (open door / pick up item: left mouse button)
